title: Emoji Shower UI Component ‚Äî emoji_shower_ui
text: emojis Character vector emoji characters image URLs display. Defaults Christmas emojis. Use emoji_presets() pre-made collections provide custom emojis. Supports: Unicode emoji characters (e.g., "üéâ", "üéÑ"), web image URLs (http://, https://), data URIs, local file paths, files extensions (.jpg, .png, .gif, .webp, .svg). Emojis randomly selected vector animation. trigger Character string specifying trigger animation. Options: "app_load" (automatically triggers page load) NULL (manual trigger via emit_shower() server). Set NULL want control shower appears via user interactions. duration Numeric. Total duration animation milliseconds. Controls long shower effect lasts clearing particles. Recommended range: 2000-10000 (2-10 seconds). Default: 6000 (6 seconds). Shorter durations create quick bursts; longer durations sustain effect. fall_speed Numeric. Gravity/velocity factor controlling fast particles fall. Affects downward acceleration emojis animation. Valid range: 0.5-2.5. Default: 1.5. Lower values create slow, elegant falls; higher values create rapid, dramatic cascades. spin_speed Numeric NULL. Rotation speed degrees per animation frame. Controls spin effect applied particles. Set numeric value (recommended: 1-5) enable rotation, NULL disable rotation (default). Higher values create faster spins. Works great emojis like üí´, ‚≠ê, üåü. particle_count Numeric. Number emoji/image particles emitted per burst. particles create denser shower effect use resources. Valid range: 5-30. Default: 15. Adjust based audience's device capabilities. burst_count Numeric. Number successive bursts animation sequence. burst single emission particles. Multiple bursts create extended animation effect. Valid range: 1-20. Default: 8. Bursts spaced 200ms apart natural staggered effect. image_size Numeric. Size images pixels (applies image URLs, emojis). Controls width height rendered images. Valid range: 16-256 pixels. Default: 32. Emoji characters scale automatically; affects external images.
